mapper.sql: SELECT id, cust_id custId, amount, freeze_amount freezeAmount, account_type accountType, busi_type busiType, parent_id parentId, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, account_no accountNo, user_id userId, has_Third_Account hasThirdAccount, user_name userName, cust_name custName, settle_type settleType, is_change_bank_card ishangeBankCard FROM t_gq_fund_account
mapper.select:
SELECT b.id id, a.CUSTOMER_NAME customerName, a.SEX sex, a.CERT_NO certNo, a.MOBILE_PHONE mobilePhone, b.account_type accountType, b.busi_type busiType, b.cust_id custId, b.account_no accountNo, b.amount amount, b.CREATE_TIME creatTime, b.freeze_amount freezeAmount, b.has_Third_Account hasThirdAccount FROM `t_gq_customer_info` a RIGHT JOIN `t_gq_fund_account` b ON a.ID=b.user_id
and b.cust_id > 100 and b.busi_type=0
and b.cust_id < 100 and b.busi_type=0
and a.CUSTOMER_NAME like concat('%',#{customerName},'%')
AND 1=1
AND b.create_time BETWEEN #{creatTime} AND SYSDATE()
AND b.create_time BETWEEN #{creatTime} AND #{modifyTime}
AND b.create_time < #{modifyTime}
